function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Crowding in supermarkets leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of spreading contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, promote alternative outlets, and encourage social distancing","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring systems, online queuing apps, and contactless payment systems","People":"Customers, retail employees, and the general public","Owner":"Retailers, government health authorities, and local municipalities"},{"Description":"Low wages leading to irregular working hours and minimal qualifications","Impact":"Decreased employee motivation, potential understaffing, and higher turnover rates","Mitigation":"Offer competitive wages, provide training and career advancement opportunities, and promote work-life balance","Technologies":"Workforce management software, employee performance tracking tools, and training platforms","People":"Retail employees and potential job applicants","Owner":"Retailers and HR departments"}]}
